s: Summary: FinTech Infrastructure day at AWS HK covering payments, custody and trust with keynotes from HashKey, AllScale, BenPay and Unitas.
Topics: On‑chain payments, self‑custody solutions, neobank architecture, institutional yield, trust‑layer protocols.
Speakers: Alex Ding (HashKey), Khalil (AllScale), Pearce (BenPay), Unitas panelists.
r: Acquire actionable knowledge on building compliant on‑chain finance stacks.
Connect with leading BaaS providers and potential integration partners.
Benefit from exclusive lucky‑draw prizes and premium networking breaks.
